trip.title: Kedarnath Dham
trip.overview: Nestled amidst the majestic Himalayan ranges, Kedarnath is a sacred pilgrimage site in Uttarakhand, India, known for its spiritual significance and natural beauty.

detailed_itinerary.title: Delhi to Rishikesh | Overnight Journey
detailed_itinerary.description: Group assembles at pickup point in Noida, sector 62 metro station. Departure towards Rishikesh with an introduction to team captains.

detailed_itinerary.title: Rishikesh to Sonprayag
detailed_itinerary.description: Morning tea break near Shivpuri, breakfast at Devprayag, and arrival in Sonprayag by evening with room allotments and dinner at the hotel.

detailed_itinerary.title: Sonprayag to Kedarnath Dham
detailed_itinerary.description: Start trek to Kedarnath after breakfast at Gaurikund. 17 km trek ending with dinner and overnight stay at Kedarnath.

detailed_itinerary.title: Kedarnath to Guptkashi/Sonprayag
detailed_itinerary.description: Kedarnath Darshan, breakfast at Choti Lincholi, and 17 km trek back to Gaurikund and Sonprayag with dinner and overnight stay.

detailed_itinerary.title: Sonprayag/Guptkashi to Delhi via Rishikesh
detailed_itinerary.description: Morning departure, breakfast, and return journey to Delhi. Arrival around 9:30pm to 10:30pm, concluding the trip.

inclusions: 6 meals (Day 1- dinner; Day 2,3- Breakfast+dinner; Day 4- Breakfast)
Transportation Delhi to Delhi by Tempo Travel/Ertigo/Innova
Driver allowances, toll taxes, parking charges
exclusions: Additional expenses due to travel delays
Hot water bucket at Kedarnath (150 INR/bucket)

booking.booking_process: Pay INR 5000 per person to reserve your seat, remaining amount to be paid 7 days before trip departure.
